name: maailma
description:
It's a tower (literally only one tower :D) defence game made by Jens & Jens for LD38.

Features

* Upgradable Mines

* Upgradable Power Plants

* ONE Tower (so many more were planned)

* Big ass mothership

* Cute little player character

How to play

Walk with A (left) and D (right). Stay on top of a mountain to gather resources automatically. Important: Then bring them to your homebase.

Upgrade via the menu in the top right. You will loose, if you or your homebase gets destroyed. You will win, if you kill the mothership in the end.
